verbs.description: [ARG0: The Late Show host Stephen Colbert] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday night] [V: took] [ARG1: aim] [ARG2: at the Trump administration ’s policy of separating children from their parents at the southern border — including Attorney General Jeff Sessions’ selective quoting of the Bible as a means to justify it] . Colbert in the video below says that enforcement of the policy is “ using cruelty as a deterrent , ” especially when the kids and parents are reportedly separated under false pretenses ...
